statuses.name: Not Started
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the live stream is created and ready to start.

statuses.name: Streaming
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the live stream is live.

statuses.name: Disconnected
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the live stream disconnects unexpectedly.

statuses.name: Stopped
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the live stream is intentionally stopped.

statuses.name: Recording
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the live stream recording begins.

statuses.name: Completed
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the live stream and recording fully complete.

statuses.name: Uploading
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when a video upload starts.

statuses.name: Transcoding
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the video is being processed for playback.

statuses.name: Completed
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the video processing finishes successfully.

statuses.name: Error
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the video upload or processing fails.

statuses.name: Completed
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when the video trimming task completes.

statuses.name: Queued
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when a transcoding job enters the queue.

statuses.name: Transcoding
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when a transcoding job starts processing.

statuses.name: Completed
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when a transcoding job completes successfully.

statuses.name: Error
statuses.description: Enable this to receive notifications when a transcoding job encounters an error.
